content.en: Speckle Interferometry Advancements: Researchers are using algorithms to answer a variety of questions in the field of digital speckle pattern interferometry. These algorithms are being used to calibrate phase shifting devices, improve the accuracy of electronic speckle photography, extract phase data in noisy environments, measure 3D shape and deformation of curved surfaces, study dynamic events, measure continuous displacements during deformation, and more. By developing and implementing these algorithms, scientists are able to enhance the capabilities of speckle interferometry and improve their measurements in various applications.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for Fnug Interferometri: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at besvare en række spørgsmål inden for digital fnug mønster interferometri. Disse algoritmer anvendes til at kalibrere fasetilskydningsenheder, forbedre nøjagtigheden af elektronisk fnug fotografering, udtrække fase data i støjfyldte miljøer, måle 3D-former og deformation af buede overflader, studere dynamiske begivenheder, måle kontinuerlige forskydninger under deformation og mere. Ved at udvikle og implementere disse algoritmer kan videnskabsmænd forbedre fnug interferometriens kapaciteter og forbedre deres målinger i forskellige anvendelser.
